system.description: When you go drinking downtown in the hopes of networking with the wealthy and powerful, roll with HEART.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, you overindulge in whatever vice plagues you most; the MC will tell you how your foolish needs get you in over your head.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value:
On a hit, you meet just the person— someone connected to an NPC of your choice; the MC will tell you who they are.

On a 7-9, they are a bit more cautious, only scratching your back if you scratch theirs; take a +1 ongoing to persuade them to help you out if you agree to a small favor before you roll.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value:
On a hit, you meet just the person— someone connected to an NPC of your choice; the MC will tell you who they are.

On a 10+, you get along famously; you can count them among your friends and they (drunkenly) agree to one favor you ask.
